Item_wood_1_01.name: Wood
Item_wood_1_01.description: It's not like you know how to build a house. Other than to use to start a fire, it's useless to you.

item_activity_cooking_RM_1.name: Apple
item_activity_cooking_RM_1.description:
A rare kind of fruit. It's said that it can only be found when collecting fallen fruits in specific seasons.

Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_2.name: Wild boar meat
item_activity_cooking_RM_2.description:
Wild boar can be found in the forests on Astra.

Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_3.name: Turkey
item_activity_cooking_RM_3.description:
A rare ingredient. It's said that all the wild turkeys were taken by the Hyenas. Maybe we can get some from them.

Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_4.name: Sesame
item_activity_cooking_RM_4.description:
A rare ingredient. It's said it looks quite like brown rice. Maybe we can find some while collecting brown rice.

Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_5.name: Sugar cube
item_activity_cooking_RM_5.description:
A scarce resource in short supply. Maybe we can find some from the Heirs of Aida.

Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_6.name: Grapes
item_activity_cooking_RM_6.description:
A rare fruit that has never been found in the wild. Some say that the Ravagers have planted some in their secret base. Maybe we can get some from them.

Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity_cooking_RM_7.name: Salmon
item_activity_cooking_RM_7.description:
A rare ingredient. Salmon have long been extinct on Aida. Only lake bass come fairly close to how true salmon tastes.

Obtained during the Aida Cafe event.

item_activity3_food1.name: Glutinous Rice Flour
item_activity3_food1.description: Soft, smooth, and fragrant glutinous rice. An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Entertainment Center's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Logistics' terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.

item_activity3_food2.name: Lotus Seed
item_activity3_food2.description: Sweet and silky lotus seeds are delicious when made into a paste! An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Entertainment Center's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Logistics' terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.

item_activity3_food3.name: Black Pepper
item_activity3_food3.description: A whiff of it makes the nose kinda itchy... An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Entertainment Center's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Logistics' terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.

item_activity3_food4.name: Ice Cream
item_activity3_food4.description: Finish it before it melts! An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Entertainment Center's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Logistics' terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.

item_activity3_food5.name: Bean Paste
item_activity3_food5.description: Enough sugar was put in while it was being made. Add more and you're going to lose some teeth! An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Entertainment Center's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Logistics' terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.

item_activity3_food6.name: Nuts
item_activity3_food6.description: A variety of small and exquisite nuts that are rich in nutrients. An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Entertainment Center's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Logistics' terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.

item_activity3_food7.name: Ham
item_activity3_food7.description: Red meat with streaks of white fat gives a unique and delicious flavor. An essential ingredient to make mooncakes during the Fortuitous Stockade event. During the event, open Vera password chests and Vera boss password chests, join Mirroria's racing event, participate in Fight the Landlord at Joy Square, play in the Entertainment Center's arcade, and make purchases from Frontier Logistics' terminal to obtain this ingredient at random.

Harvest_Shells_001.name: Conch
Harvest_Shells_001.description: Legend has it a beautiful, kind girl lives inside. And it tastes pretty good.

Harvest_Shells_002.name: Scallop
Harvest_Shells_002.description: One of the primary food source for coastal dwellers. Already seasoned with sea salt, just grill and serve.

Harvest_Shells_003.name: Carrion snail
Harvest_Shells_003.description: A rare variety of giant snail with a weird appetite, but is surprisingly tasty.

Harvest_Shells_005.name: Hermit crab
Harvest_Shells_005.description: It has grown again! And now it gets a new... steamy "house."

Harvest_Shells_006.name: Portunid
Harvest_Shells_006.description: Sea crabs living on the shallow edge of the sea which sometimes come ashore to soak up the sun. Very delicious.

Harvest_shells_007.name: Sea urchin
Harvest_shells_007.description: A delicacy from the shallow edge of the sea, though not for everyone.

Harvest_shells_008.name: Oyster
Harvest_shells_008.description: A favorite of the luminaries in the city. Rumors circulate about it having special effects.

Harvest_Shells_009.name: Barnacle
Harvest_Shells_009.description: It looks scary, but yummy to the tongue!

Harvest_Fruit_001.name: Fallen Fruit
Harvest_Fruit_001.description: Fruit fallen to the ground. Edible if you clean the mud off.

Harvest_Fruit_002.name: Strawberry
Harvest_Fruit_002.description: Don't wait for it to ripen, or it would be eaten by wild animals long before that.

Harvest_Fruit_003.name: Phosphogranate
Harvest_Fruit_003.description: After the initial sour-sweet taste comes... only blandness left, yet it's a waste to throw it away.

Harvest_Fruit_004.name: Firedragon Fruit
Harvest_Fruit_004.description: Remember to remove the seeds before eating it.

Harvest_Fruit_006.name: Thornmato
Harvest_Fruit_006.description: Although the plant's leaves turned into thorns after being exposed to Omnium radiation, the fruit itself tastes much better than before.

Harvest_Fruit_007.name: Balloon Fruit
Harvest_Fruit_007.description: The matured form goes wherever the wind takes it.

Harvest_Fruit_008.name: Lard gourd
Harvest_Fruit_008.description: Tastes pretty good, actually, despite the irradiated appearance.

Harvest_Greens_001.name: Lettuce
Harvest_Greens_001.description: Are you craving power? Eat it, then you will have infinite power!

Harvest_Greens_002.name: Wild cabbage
Harvest_Greens_002.description: It resembles a ball, but that doesn't mean you can kick it like one.

Harvest_Greens_003.name: Broccoli
Harvest_Greens_003.description: Nutritious, and every kid loves it.

Harvest_Greens_005.name: Spicy onion
Harvest_Greens_005.description: Made my eyes water when I cut it, so I tried to rub my face...

Harvest_Greens_007.name: Laver
Harvest_Greens_007.description: A type of kelp. Easily washed ashore by waves.

Harvest_Greens_008.name: Fiddlehead
Harvest_Greens_008.description: Time to eat your veggie! Won't grow tall if you're finicky!

Harvest_Greens_009.name: Fish mint
Harvest_Greens_009.description: If you can stand the taste, you can't get enough of it.

Harvest_Greens_010.name: Peat moss
Harvest_Greens_010.description: The best choice for detox, though it has a weird taste.

Harvest_Greens_011.name: Black moss
Harvest_Greens_011.description: Grows only on the exposed cliff face. It's edible, at least.

Harvest_Mushroom_001.name: Mushroom
Harvest_Mushroom_001.description: Fungi seen in wild grasslands. Young lasses just love to pick them.

Harvest_Mushroom_002.name: Suncap
Harvest_Mushroom_002.description: Sprouts toward the sun only after raining. Supposedly tastes like sunshine.

Harvest_Mushroom_004.name: Firecap
Harvest_Mushroom_004.description: Seems to be a variety of woodear fungus transformed by elements of flame. Tastes rather spicy.

Harvest_Mushroom_005.name: Monkey head mushroom
Harvest_Mushroom_005.description: Bland in both taste and appearance, but allegedly very high in nutrients.

Harvest_Mushroom_006.name: Black Truffle
Harvest_Mushroom_006.description: Rare and expensive mushroom that grows in rather specific, stringent environments.

Harvest_Mushroom_007.name: Ghost mushroom
Harvest_Mushroom_007.description: Fungi indigenous to caves. Eat too much of them and you'll be seeing stars.

Harvest_Fishes_001.name: Silver bass
Harvest_Fishes_001.description: Silver bass can live in freshwater or temporarily in the sea. They are meaty and delicious.

Harvest_Fishes_005.name: Lake bass
Harvest_Fishes_005.description: This fish is good any way you cook it.

Harvest_Fishes_006.name: Dabry's Sturgeon
Harvest_Fishes_006.description: Sturgeon living in shallow waters. Small in size, great for braising or stew.

Harvest_Follows_001.name: Snow lotus
Harvest_Follows_001.description: Whoa! What a big ole white cabbage!

Harvest_Follows_002.name: Small Azalea
Harvest_Follows_002.description: Extremely high in medicinal value without side effects. Consume as much as you want.

Harvest_Nuts_001.name: Hazelnut
Harvest_Nuts_001.description: A certain account pegs this as the culprit of the cracking of tectonic plates during Ice Age.

Harvest_Nuts_002.name: Cocoa Beans
Harvest_Nuts_002.description: Cocoa beans are versatile. One can make bitter coffee or sweet chocolates with them.

Harvest_Nuts_003.name: Pinecone
Harvest_Nuts_003.description: An apple might not be the only thing that drops on your head. It could be a pinecone.

Harvest_Nuts_004.name: Walnut shell
Harvest_Nuts_004.description: Eat more of it if you want to become smarter.
